title: Best of The Program | Guests: Sidney Powell & Bill O’Reilly | 11/20/20
description:
The Trump legal team held a massive press conference, and Bill O’Reilly gives his take. Is there any hope the Supreme Court will reverse the election? Attorney Sidney Powell of Trump’s legal team joins to break down her claims of election fraud involving Dominion, Smartmatic, Germany, and others. And she previews a plan to release even more documents to the public. Fulton County, New York, Sheriff Richard Giardino talks his refusal to endorse Gov. Cuomo’s coronavirus restrictions this Thanksgiving.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
